item.description:
Vamos a cenar en Dalí, mi restaurante favorito.

Tapas (platos pequenos) cuestan un promedio de $5-8.50 cada uno, y una persona puede comer varias. Sangria o vino cuesta $5.50-8 por vaso. Planea gastar $45-60 mas propina y por favor lleva efectivo.

Encontrémonos en el bar, y nos sentamos cuando lleguen todos.

PLEASE RSVP. I NEED TO LET THEM KNOW HOW MANY PEOPLE ARE COMING.

They will not seat us until everyone has arrived so let's meet in the bar.

Because of the size of the group, it seems easier to split the bill and share tapas, pitchers of sangria and/or bottles of wine. Plan to spend $45-60 plus tip, and PLEASE BRING CASH to make things easier. There is an ATM across the street.


http://www.dalirestau...

group.name: The Boston Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: ¡Tapas en Dalí! ¡Olé!
